forager.domain

Class VisitMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • forager.domain.VisitMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<VisitMap>

    public class VisitMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<VisitMap>
    Class for storing a map of visited normal tiles and special tiles that have been spent.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VisitMap(boolean[] specialVisited, boolean[][] visited, int specialTilesVisited)
      Creates a new VisitMap.
      VisitMap(Dungeon dungeon)
      Creates a new VisitMap based on a dungeon.
      VisitMap(VisitMap visitMap, Tile tile)
      Creates a new VisitMap based on a previous visit map.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VisitMap

        public VisitMap(boolean[] specialVisited,
                boolean[][] visited,
                int specialTilesVisited)
        Creates a new VisitMap. Used mainly for testing.
        Parameters:
        specialVisited - Boolean array marking whether each special tile has been visited on this map.
        visited - Boolean map marking whether normal tiles have been visited.
        specialTilesVisited - number of special tiles visited.

      • VisitMap

        public VisitMap(Dungeon dungeon)
        Creates a new VisitMap based on a dungeon. Only used for the first VisitMap created.
        Parameters:
        dungeon - dungeon the VisitMap is based on.

      • VisitMap

        public VisitMap(VisitMap visitMap,
                Tile tile)
        Creates a new VisitMap based on a previous visit map. Used most of the time.
        Parameters:
        visitMap - visit map from previous cycle.
        tile - new special tile to be added to the visit map.

    • Method Detail

      • isVisited

        public boolean isVisited(int x,
                         int y)
        Checks if a normal tile is marked as visited.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate
        y - y-coordinate
        Returns:
        true or false

      • setVisited

        public void setVisited(int x,
                       int y)
        Marks a normal tile as visited
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate
        y - y-coordinate

      • getSpecialVisited

        public boolean getSpecialVisited(int specialNum)
        Checks if a particular special tile has been visited
        Parameters:
        specialNum - index of the special tile on the special tiles array
        Returns:
        true or false as marked on specialVisited
